co.cask.cdap.api.spark
Interface Spark

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSpark
public interface Spark

Defines an interface for the Spark job.

Method Summary

          Invoked before starting a Spark job.

          Configures a Spark job by returning a SparkSpecification.

          Invoked after a Spark job finishes.
 

Method Detail

configure

Configures a Spark job by returning a SparkSpecification.

Returns:
An instance of SparkSpecification.

beforeSubmit

void beforeSubmit(SparkContext context)
                  throws Exception
Invoked before starting a Spark job.

Parameters:
context - job execution context
Throws:
Exception - if there's an error during this method invocation

onFinish

void onFinish(boolean succeeded,
              SparkContext context)
              throws Exception
Invoked after a Spark job finishes. Will not be called if: Job failed to start.

Parameters:
succeeded - defines the result of job execution: true if job succeeded, false otherwise
context - job execution context
Throws:
Exception - if there's an error during this method invocation.
